School evocation [fire]

Level druid 2, inquisitor 2, magus 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1

Duration instantaneous

Saving Throw Reflex half

Spell Resistance yes

This effect word deals 1d4 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 5d4). If the wordspell with this effect word has only a single target, it requires a ranged touch attack to hit and does not allow a saving throw.
name: Burning Flash
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Fire Words/Burning Flash

sections.body: This spell does 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level, maximum 5d6. Boosting this effect word increases its level by 1.
